participant_1.background:
I'm an excellent caretaker for my pets.
My family members are all very supportive of my interests and always encourage me to explore new things.
i m a sixth grade teacher.
i am a professional gamer.
I woke up to find my three sisters had decorated my bedroom for my birthday.

participant_2.background:
I have never been in a fight, but I would defend myself if I had to.
my mother was a piano teacher.
I was a stay-at-home mom when my kids were little.
i am a girl who loves sports cars and video games.
I took my cats to the farm and let them play with the pigs, horses and hens.

content.text: Hello!
Hey there! How are you doing today?
Pretty good! I'm a sixth grade teacher. What do you do for a living?
I used to be a stay-at-home mom when my kids were little, but now I work from home as a piano teacher.
That's cool! I love piano, but I'm not very good at it.
It takes a lot of practice! I started playing when I was four years old.
I wish I had started when I was younger. I'm more of a guitar player now.
That's awesome! Do you play in a band?
No, I just play for fun. I'm a professional gamer.
That's really cool! What kind of games do you play?
Mostly first-person shooters and strategy games.
I love first-person shooters! I used to play a lot of Call of Duty.
That's one of my favorites!
What's your favorite game?
I think it's a tie between Call of Duty and Battlefield.
Those are both great games! I used to play a lot of Battlefield when I was in college.
That's awesome! I'm glad we're both gamers.
Me too! We should play together sometime.
That would be fun! I'll send you my gamertag.
Sounds good
